mapper.select: select * from product join fileupload on product.fu_no = fileupload.fu_no
select * from product p join fileupload f on f.fu_no=p.fu_no join productbrand b on b.pb_no = p.pb_no where p_no = #{p_no }
select * from styling s join fileupload f on f.fu_no = s.fu_no join fileuploadtype ft on ft.fut_no = f.fut_no join stylingproduct sp on sp.s_no = s.s_no where p_no = #{p_no }
